caption.p: Protection efficacy of monoclonal antibodies against RVFV infection in Huh7 cells. ( A, B) RVFV MP-12 strains expressing Renilla luciferase (RVFV-SRluc) amplified in Huh7 cells were mixed with threefold serial dilutions of the indicated neutralizing antibodies (NAbs). The luciferase activity (Luc) was measured via the Renilla luciferase assay system. The neutralization of RVFV (%) was calculated as (1 − Luc measured/Luc virus control) × 100. Sigmoid neutralizing curves were generated through GraphPad Prism 8. Experiments were repeated three times, and the representative results are presented.
